name: 3rd International Forum on Electronics and Electrical Engineering-
content: It is with great pleasure that we welcome all the researchers in the field of Electrical Engineering to the 3rd International Forum on Electronics and Electrical Engineering (EEEFORUM2024), which will be held in Zurich, Switzerland during October 10-12, 2024\. The aim of EEEFORUM2024 is to be a premier international forum to highlighting the novel developments, to share new ideas, research results and development experiences and providing networking opportunities with the peers to help establish connections for early career scientists to meet a diverse mix of researchers, decision makers to strengthen existing connections and forge new ones.
